Title: PartTracker
Description:
This application will allow multiple users to keep track of parts, and to manage the hours used.

Build using SQLite, WPF, and C#
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This application will allow multiple users to keep track of parts, and to manage the hours used.

Build using SQLite, WPF, and C#

When running the application for the first time:

Create a database file in a location that everyone can access.
You can name it whatever you want. I recommend "PartsTracker.sqlite"

When the application launches, browse to this file. The database will start empty.
